content.question: Influential critics of the 1950â€™s, such as David Riesman, were most concerned with which of the following aspects of the life in the United States following the Second World War?

choices.label: Alienation and conformity in modern society
The economic responsibilities of being a world superpower
The threat to the nation form communist subversion

content.answer: Alienation and conformity in modern society

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
